name: My File Explorer
description: My File Explorer lets you easily view, manage and store files on your Android device.  Key Features:   Store, view or manage any documents on your Android device.  In App File Name Search  Copy, paste, move, delete and create text files.  PDF Reader (Android 4.4+)  Email your files.  Open email attachments.  Zip, unzip and unrar support. Also supports password protected zip and rar files.  Several file listing and sorting options  * Starting in Android 4.4, apps (including ours) can not modify files in SD CARD (external storage) anymore. But you can still modify files in internal storage.
